FuncDef: This command specifies the range of VLAN IDs that are controlled by MVRP on the port associated with the parent SAP. When the command is present under a certain SAP, the MVRP will treat the associated virtual port as an end-station.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the range index. Values-1 to 4094.
Specifies the range of VLANs to be controlled by MVRP. Values-1 to 4094.
